actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the form for Federal estate tax returns should include certain information.

summary.text: States the sense of the House of Representatives that the Internal Revenue Service should include on the estate tax return a statement setting forth the limitations on penalties for good faith errors in such returns.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the form for Federal estate tax returns should include certain information.
